pages.text: $(bgreen)Twin Sunflower$() was created at a crazed night of forbidden science. Thunder crashed overhead, strange lights flickered. But to no avail. Twin Sunflower was alive, ALIVE!$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)150$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Very Slow$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)producer$() plant that generate $(byellow)double sun$() every 25 seconds. It will $(bred)slow down four times at night or when it rains.$()
$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() It will instantly produce large amount of sun.
